name: Cranberry Apple Cider Cocktail
description: A flavorful carnberry apple cider with orange juice and vodka.

ingredients.ingredient: hard cider (Angry Orchard/ Stella Artois Cidre)

directions: Fill glass and cocktail shaker with ice
then Add cranberry juice, orange juice and vodka to the cocktail shaker and shake until chilled. Strain into ice filled glass.
Top off the glass with the hard cider and garnish with apple slice
keywords: Apple cider cocktail with orange juice
